block.biomeswevegone.florus.stem_sapling:
A cactus-like wood type.
I'm not sure how to replant it...
block.biomeswevegone.maple_sapling.expan: A good tree, unfortunately named after a former friend.
block.biomeswevegone.red_maple_sapling.e: The tree name reminds me of Canada...
block.biomeswevegone.skyris.expanded_too: A foreign type of tree found by that hare.
block.biomeswevegone.yellow_sakura_sapli: A type of tree that seems to be popular with anime watchers.
block.biomeswevegone.white_sakura_saplin: A type of tree that seems to be popular with anime watchers.
block.create.hand_crank.expanded_tooltip: A hand-turned crank to power my saw.
block.create.mechanical_saw.expanded_too: A saw utility. Good for cutting down trees fast.
block.minecraft.allium.expanded_tooltips: A nice flower. Too bad I don't need it...
block.minecraft.birch_sapling.expanded_t: A nice, white type of tree.
block.minecraft.cactus.expanded_tooltips: That kind of hurts, but it gets me green dye.
block.minecraft.calcite.expanded_tooltip: I know a gnome friend who likes these.
block.minecraft.cherry_sapling.expanded_: A type of tree commonly used by weebs.
block.minecraft.dark_oak_sapling.expande: I know a gnome friend who likes this kind of tree.
block.minecraft.dandelion.expanded_toolt: A nice flower. Too bad I don't need it...
block.minecraft.dirt.expanded_tooltips.d:
An essential building block for farming.
Need to find me a lot of these...
block.minecraft.green_banner.expanded_to: The color is almost after my favorite color...
block.minecraft.kelp.expanded_tooltips.d: I almost wish I could smoke this.
block.minecraft.oak_sapling.expanded_too: An oak tree. The easiest type to farm.
block.minecraft.obsidian.expanded_toolti: An element for nether portals. Really hard to break...
block.minecraft.player_head.expanded_too: The disembodied head of a player.
block.minecraft.powder_snow.expanded_too: A terrible block that inflicts entrapment and cruel cold.
block.minecraft.sand.expanded_tooltips.d: The hare can give me dirt if I get her this.
block.minecraft.spruce_sapling.expanded_: A spruce tree. An easy type to come across.
block.minecraft.sugar_cane.expanded_tool:
A good item for making Paper.
How do I farm this again?
A simple utility that brings light.
block.minecraft.tnt.expanded_tooltips.de: A simple bomb. Are these Taph's?
item.minecraft.apple.expanded_tooltips.d: A healthy snack while you work!
item.minecraft.bone.expanded_tooltips.de:
A good treat for a good boy.
When crushed up, it makes a good fertilizer.
item.minecraft.bone_meal.expanded_toolti: An amazing fertilizer for grass and trees.
item.minecraft.diamond.expanded_tooltips: A solid ore for making tools.
item.minecraft.diamond_axe.expanded_tool: Whiteclaw wants another victim. And mending.
item.minecraft.diamond_pickaxe.expanded_:
A good utility for mining Obsidian.
I should get Mending before I main one of these...
item.minecraft.diamond_shovel.expanded_t: A tool for the long haul.
item.minecraft.dried_kelp.expanded_toolt:
A sea-based item for eating.
Kind of stale and hard to eat...
item.minecraft.ender_pearl.expanded_tool: I can throw these on my own, why do I need these?
item.minecraft.iron_ingot.expanded_toolt:
A disposable ore for throwaway tools.
Also good for making blocks!
item.minecraft.milk_bucket.expanded_tool: A simple drink to take off the buzz.
item.minecraft.water_bucket.expanded_too: A good MLG trick. But touching water hurts...
item.minecraft.wheat_seeds.expanded_tool: I used to throw these away. I still do.
item.aether.blue_berry.expanded_tooltips: A nice snack. It seems to come from another universe...
item.aether.zanite_ore.expanded_tooltips: Amazing gems that speed up as they wear down.
item.aether.gravitite_shovel.expanded_to:
A very efficient mining tool.
Makes dirt, gravel and sand go bye bye if you right click!
item.farmersdelight.onion.expanded_toolt:
An alright snack.
I should bake with these instead of eating them raw...
item.origins.orb_of_origin.expanded_tool: A shiny orb that lets you change your family lineage.
